Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.7 Pañhāvāra » 16.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Micchattaniyatattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
62.
2425Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta…pe…  namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2426Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
